org.mmbase.util.externalprocess

Class StreamCopyThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.mmbase.util.externalprocess.StreamCopyThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    class StreamCopyThread
extends Thread
    Thread which continuously reads from a input stream and pushes the read data to an output stream which is immediately flushed afterwards.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.6
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Nico Klasens (Finalist IT Group)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamCopyThread

        public StreamCopyThread(String name,
                        InputStream in,
                        OutputStream out,
                        boolean pInput)
        Create a thread to copy bytes fro one strea to the other
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new thread
        in - the stream from which to pipe the data
        out - the stream to pipe the data to
        pInput - This thread writes to the external process

      • StreamCopyThread

        public StreamCopyThread(ThreadGroup group,
                        String name,
                        InputStream in,
                        OutputStream out,
                        boolean pInput)
        Create a thread to copy bytes fro one stream to the other
        Parameters:
        group - ThreadGroup where this thread belongs to
        name - the name of the new thread
        in - the stream from which to pipe the data
        out - the stream to pipe the data to
        bSize - the size of the buffer in which data is piped
        pInput - This thread writes to the external process
